languages.text: "Не важно, заслужила ли она. Я поступил правильно, потому что так было правильно".
"Whether she deserved it does not matter. I did what was right because it was right."
languages.original_text: "Не важно, заслужила ли она. Я поступил правильно, потому что так было правильно".

traits.locale_text: "Whether she deserved it is unimportant. I did what was right because it was right."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Whether she deserved it is unimportant. I did what was right because it was right."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Whether she deserved it does not matter. I did what was right because it was right."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Whether she deserved it does not matter. I did what was right because it was right."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Whether she deserved it does not matter. I did what was right because it was right."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Whether she deserved it does not matter. I did what was right because it was right."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「彼女の行いは問題ではない。自分が正しいことをしたのは、それが正しかったからにすぎません」
languages.original_text: "Whether she deserved it does not matter. I did what was right because it was right."

traits.locale_text: 「彼女の行いは問題ではない。自分が正しいことをしたのは、それが正しかったからにすぎません」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “她是否应得如此下场并不重要。我选择做正确的事情，因为它是正确的。”
languages.original_text: "Whether she deserved it does not matter. I did what was right because it was right."

traits.locale_text: “她是否应得如此下场并不重要。我选择做正确的事情，因为它是正确的。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Là n'est pas la question. J'ai fait ce qu'il fallait, rien de plus, rien de moins. »
languages.original_text: "Whether she deserved it does not matter. I did what was right because it was right."

traits.locale_text: « Là n'est pas la question. J'ai fait ce qu'il fallait, rien de plus, rien de moins. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «No importa si se lo merecía o no. He hecho lo correcto porque era lo que se debía hacer».
languages.original_text: "Whether she deserved it does not matter. I did what was right because it was right."

traits.locale_text: «No importa si se lo merecía o no. He hecho lo correcto porque era lo que se debía hacer».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Ob sie es verdient hatte, ist irrelevant. Ich habe das Richtige getan, weil es richtig war."
languages.original_text: "Whether she deserved it does not matter. I did what was right because it was right."

traits.locale_text: "Ob sie es verdient hatte, ist irrelevant. Ich habe das Richtige getan, weil es richtig war."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Hak edip etmemiş olması önemli değil. Doğru olanı, doğru olduğu için yaptım."
languages.original_text: "Whether she deserved it does not matter. I did what was right because it was right."

traits.locale_text: "Onu hak edip etmemiş olması önemli değil. Doğru olanı, doğru olduğu için yaptım."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
